name: double-team
effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.platinum: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
